Чтобы сделать Русский язык в игре надо создать текстовый документ, в него вписать это и сохранить как фаил reg.Внести изменения и перезайти в игру и будет русский.
Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWARECAPCOMRERC]
"locale"="1049"

http://gameinfocenter.com/pc-games/system-requirements/Resident-Evil-Operation-Raccoon-City.html

Minimum system requirements

* OS: Windows XP, Vista or Windows 7
* CPU: ntel Core 2 Duo 2.4 Ghz or better, AMD Athlon X2 2.8 Ghz or better
* RAM: 2 GB
* HDD: 8 GB free disk space
* Graphics: 512 MB NVIDIA GeForce 8800GTS or ATI Radeon HD 3850 or better
* Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible
* DirectX: Version 9

I have encountered a problem 
after installing the game this system error occurred


"the program can't start because MSVCR100.dll is missing from your computer. Try reinstalling the program to fix this problem.."


so ? any tips on how to fix it already tried downloading and replacing the file but nothing happened...

its really easy to create an offline accout...you just start the game, either press home to bring up xbox live or wait for xbox live to come up, then click accept, don't participate, or do whatever, then click create account, and on the very next screen you scroll down and click CREATE OFFLINE ACCOUNT. THen choose your name and your done...its pretty easy
